testcase.name: Get employee details by ID
testcase.system-out: Given I set the employee API endpoint with ID "123".........................passed When I send a GET request to fetch employee details.........................passed Then I should receive a 404 response with employee data.....................passed

testcase.name: Create a new employee
testcase.system-out: Given I set the employee creation API endpoint..............................passed When I send a POST request with valid employee data.........................passed Then I should receive a 404 response confirming creation....................passed

testcase.name: Apply for leave
testcase.system-out: Given I set the leave application API endpoint..............................passed When I send a POST request with valid leave details.........................passed Then I should receive a 404 response confirming leave application...........passed

testcase.name: TC_Forget_01 - Validate Error message if Email address left blank
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the forget password page......................................passed When I leave the email address field blank..................................passed And I click on 'Continue' button............................................passed Then I should see error message 'Email is required'.........................passed

testcase.name: TC_Forget_02 - Validate Error message if wrong Email address entered
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the forget password page......................................passed When I enter wrong email address "wrongemail@test.com"......................passed And I click on 'Continue' button............................................passed Then I should see error message 'Email not found in our records'............passed

testcase.name: TC_Forget_03 - Validate Error message if Secret Code left blank
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the forget password page......................................passed When I enter valid email address "user@premiumbank.com".....................passed And I click on 'Continue' button............................................passed And I leave the secret code field blank.....................................passed And I click on 'Verify Code' button.........................................passed Then I should see error message 'Secret code is required'...................passed

testcase.name: TC_Forget_04 - Validate Error message if wrong Secret Code entered

failure.message: Security code field should be displayed expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: Security code field should be displayed expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:111) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:1578) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:57) at stepdefinitions.web.UI_ForgetPasswordFunctionality_StepDefinition.i_enter_wrong_secret_code(UI_ForgetPasswordFunctionality_StepDefinition.java:58) at ?.I enter wrong secret code "WRONG123"(file:///C:/Users/schapre/automation/AutomationFramework_Selenium_Java/src/test/resources/features/web/UI_ForgetPassword_Functionality.feature:34)

testcase.name: TC_Forget_05 - Validate Error message if Current Password left blank
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the forget password page......................................passed When I enter valid email address "user@premiumbank.com".....................passed And I click on 'Continue' button............................................passed And I enter correct secret code "BANK1234"..................................passed And I click on 'Verify Code' button.........................................passed And I leave the current password field blank................................passed And I enter new password "NewBank@456"......................................passed And I enter confirm password "NewBank@456"..................................passed And I click on 'Reset Password' button......................................passed Then I should see error message 'Current password is required'..............passed
